From tap at MBCC 2017. A hazy golden coloured beer with a white head. Aroma and flavour of malt, straw, hos, fruit and with a bitter finish.

Ampolla de Vins J. Carreras. Cervesa groc p√†lid una mica t√®rbola, amb escuma blanca una mica cremosa. Aromes afruitats, herbacis i de cereal. Hi trobo cereal, pa, albercoc, pinya, pl√†tan i herba. En boca es amarga i de final sec. Refrescant. Molt bona.
Weizen Dryness HOPMonster mit tiefer PrilK√§sefu√üVerneigung ‚ò∫. A Knife In The Grainfield üéÜ‚ú®üëΩ. Love NAPARBCN!!!üíãToo :). NAPARBCN. TAP.

Light tropical fruits, mango, passion fruit. Clear gold, small, creamy, white head. Light bitter. More citrus fruits, unripe mango, passion fruit, tangerine, soft carbonation, medium bodied. Decent Wheat Ale, well-balanced. Keg at MBCC Red Session, Copenhagen.
MBCC. Hazy golden with a white head. Aroma is sweet, wheaty and moderate hoppy - grapefruit. Flavor is quite sweet and rather bitter. Sweet and moderate bitter finish. 130517
Sample at MBCC. Pours slightly cloudy golden. Aroma is hoppy, pine. Taste is smooth, balanced, lots of bitterness in finish, clean.

Draught at MBCC 2017. High fluffy white lasting head. Clear yellow body. Dusty mild fruity aroma. Mild fruity straw grass flavor with a fair amount of hops bitterness, low carbonation and a long dry and bitter finish Well balanced with an alcohol level that seems just right.
Sample at MBCC 2017. Hoppy, fruity and bready smell. Not very hoppy. Medium bitterness.

Pours a hazy golden colour, with a semall head that fades soon. Good lace. Aroma of resin, tropical fruits, coriander Medium body, ioly palate, good carbonation. Taste of resin, orange, tropical fruits. Good refreshing beer.
Draft. A hazy golden beer with a lazing white head. The aroma has notes of lemons, straw, and hops. The flavor is sweet with notes of straw, lemons, and malt, leading to a biter finsih.
From tap. Pours cloudy yellow with a small white head. Aroma is fruity, crisp hoppy. Peachy and slight citrusy. Bitter, grassy and slight herbal. Dry. Grassy and herbal far finish.

Splendide robe dor√©e, fine mousse a√©rienne. Nez puissant et complexe sur des notes d¬íagrumes, de houblon, de gingembre, de lime sur un fond de c√©r√©ales et d¬íasperges. Bouche √† l¬íattaque acidul√©e sur les agrumes, belle bulle am√®re, longue finale sur l¬íamertume des agrumes. Une superbe bi√®re de soif.
Barcelona backlog. Tap at BierCab. Aroma of citrus, grass and earthy. Some wheat and yeasty notes. Mild malty backbone - Otherwise bitter. Medium body.

Tirada directamente de barril por los chicos de Naparbier en el Colagallo Pub Granada. Aroma de l√∫pulo con notas de pi√±a y lima. Color amarillo brumoso con cabeza blanca. Sabor de pino, final fuerte de l√∫pulo, cuya amargura dura mucho tiempo. Baja carbonataci√≥n y cuerpo medio. El trigo no est√° muy presente, pero le da frescor a la ipa y la equilibra.

Tap @biercab, Barcelona. 
Aroma is hoppy with notes of pineapple and lime. Hazy yellow color with white head. Not as cloudy as a Weiss. Taste of pine, strong hoppy backbone and finish with bitterness lasting for a long time. Low carbonation and medium body. Wheat is not very present but it is still a well balanced wheat IPA.
Ca√±a en Festival Cerveza Artesana Langreo. Aroma lupulado suave, apariencia clara, sabores citricos y herbales.

33 cl bottle @ home. BBE 07/2017.
Pours clear pale golden color with a large white head. Pineapple sweet aroma, mild hops, some wheat notes and yeast. Flavor is also sweet with pineapple and peach, wheat-y, a bit herbal, earthy, subtle citric notes. Okay but a bit too sweet for my taste.
4334
Hazy golden colour with white head. Tropical fruits and citric, hoppy aroma. Sweet, juice, citric taste. Medium body.

330ml bottle @ monthly tasting, Chez Sophie, courtesy of Simon. Thanks chap. Pours hazy gold, no head. Aroma is fruity orange, caramel. Taste continues with soft sherbetty orange citrus, odd crystallised notes, pine.. quite a lot going on, not particularly balanced, and not 100% convinced about it, although I like the smooth fruity notes creeping in on the finish.
Hazy yellow with quick fading head. Aroma has light citrus, coriander, grass. Flavour has a fresh, light, wheaty feel up front. It gets hoppier and drier with some citrusy, bitter elements.

Draft at Wateringhole, Amsterdam. Cloudy golden (end of the barrel) with a thick white head. Aroma of citrus, green hops, weedy, light yeast, fruity and light malt. Flavour is above moderate sweet and moderate bitter. Light medium bodied with soft carbonation.

330ml bottle. Minimally cloudy, yellow-ish, golden colour with average, frothy to creamy, fairly lasting, minimally lacing, snow-white head. Citrusy and minimally piney, hoppy aroma, notes of pineapple, lemon, lemon zest. Taste is citrusy and moderately bitter hoppy, notes of lemon, lemon zest, some pineapple, rather neutral, self-denying, hop-supporting malty backbone with subtle sweetness; more density and complexity of lemon flavours in the finish, additional leafy, herbal and zesty aspects come in, lively carbonation throughout. Refreshing, highly drinkable - very nice.

18th December 2016Hazy gold beer with a bubbly pale cream colour head. Fair bit of hop filth on the nose, garlic and onion. Palate is light and semi dry, good fine minerally carbonation. Smooth malts, mildly sweet. Smooth hop skunk and pine, the garlic and onion are here but not as strong as the nose, just a whisper really. Light crystallised fruits into smooth orange and lemon citrus. Cooling piney minerally finish. Interesting stuff. Naparbier have come on leaps and bounds for me.

33cl bottle from De Caigny opened to celebrate selling my house
Thick creamy white head. Very hazy golden pour. Lovely bitterness. Very good.

Bottle 33cl
@ Guevara & Lynch, Seville, Spain.
A: Hazy golden.
T: Hops, citrus, grapefruit.

Cloudy light amber with small bubbly head that recedes quickly. Aroma is orange, mango, pine and wheat with a banana undertone. Taste is light bitter hops with crisp, refreshing orange and grass notes. Creamish mouthfeel, average carbonation. Medium bitter finish. Great.

Muy floral en nariz, muy fresca, m√°s c√≠trica en boca. Cuerpo medio. Refrescante a pesar de los grados. Muy buena. 
Lote 16324 BB 2017-07

Bottle from La Vache Folle. Clear golden colour, off white head. Nose is caramel malts, grapefruits, bit medicinal, juicy. Flavour is light malted, grapefruit and citric hops, fruity, slightly sticky. Fairly bitter, medium bodied and medium carbonation. Really well balanced and well drinkable.

Color amarillo pajizo, transl√∫cido, con capa de espuma blanca y grumosa de tres dedos de grosor (muy buena retenci√≥n). Carbonataci√≥n media tirando a alta. Aroma c√≠trico y lupulado. Sabor c√≠trico, lupulado, √°cido debido al trigo, con amargor final muy bien medido (ni mucho ni poco). Interesante cerveza. Naparbier arriesga y suele ganar.

0,1l from tap at Craft Bier Fest Wien shared with a friend. light yellow hazy color, small white head. smells fruity of oranges, bit citric, spices, light mango. nice smell. full body, soft carbonation, slick mouthfeel. tastes of grapefruit, orange zest, light herbal, pines, light spices. finishes lightly bitter with notes of grapefruit, herbs and some pines. very nice one, very good balance.

Draught at CBF Wien.
Golden, clear body, with a medium, creamy, off-white head. 
Aroma of grapefruit, caramel, flowers, resin, some wheat. 
Taste follows this pretty much. 
Medium, oily mouthfeel, with an average carbonation. 
Finishes bitter, a bit dry, zesty, citric, floral, a bit herbal. 

Nice one, while nothing special. Straight and clean, but I¬ím missing some more character. Nice citric notes throughout though.

33cl bottle @Cimmeria, Oviedo. 02-11-2016.
BBD: 7-2017.
In short: citrusy bitter wheat ale.
Pours quite hazy bright golden with frothy white head. Short head retention, some lacing. Citrusy, herbal nose. Medium body, high carbonation, crispy texture. Taste is moderate bitter, citrusy, little wheat character, dry aftertaste.

Botella. @Cimmeria, Oviedo 29/10/2016. BBD:07/17
Color amarillo pajizo, sabor c√≠trico, frutal,sabor c√≠trico, levadura, cuerpo medio.

Tomada en Cerveceria Kraken.

Ipa con trigo de 7¬∞.

Cuerpo medio.
Rubia de color pajizo y espuma blanca.

Maltosa y frutal. Muy fresca. 
Facil de beber.
Remate ligeramente dulce.

Para repetir

Pours a slightly hazy, almost clear pale golden color with medium white head. Aroma has intense citrus notes, orange, grapefruit and lemon peel, also some yeast and bread. Taste follows the nose, sweet, with strong citrus character, yeast and slightly spiciness. Moderate bitter aftertaste.

Botella 33 cl en el kraken. Lote 16324 hasta 07..2017. (r05). Aromas y sabores frescos herbaceos convtoques maltosos y cereales. Ligeros citricos y verdes Juniperos y algo de resinas. Cuerpo ligero a medio refrescante con 7 vol que lo acent√∫a todo m√°s. Buena.
Light but hazy golden. Incredible fresh aroma of kumquat, kiwi, and pineapples. Taste is a bit more juicy melons.
Pours clear blonde, small white head. Smell is bit medicinal, hops, not too bitter. Taste is Sharp, bit Pine, mild bitterness. Very fruity. Ok

From Decervecitas. In Teku glass. Watching Hotel Transilvania 2 with the kids. Mouthfilling, soapy. Citric and herbal. May not be their most amazing hop profile but pleasantly sticks for long to palate

Tasting glass draft @ Billie¬ís Bier Kaf√©taria. Clear pale citrus, little white head. Nose is juicy citrus hops, dank, quite fruity but also low plaster yeast. Taste wise the plaster yeast is upfront which is bit of a downer, there is citrus, low dank citrus hop, oily low dank hop but also some plaster yeast. Very nice hops, good base but the yeast clearly takes me down, didn¬ít get any real wheat profile.
